comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111218 Firefox/11.0a1 SeaMonkey/2.8a1 ID:20111218003004

Folderpane Tools 0.6.1 and FolderFlags 1.2.4 installed
Not yet tested in Safe Mode (I will, within 24 hours, if I don't forget)

Reproducible: Always
1. In the left pane, select a newsgroup with unread.
2. Note the number of unreads after it has stabilized (and possibly downloaded some new headers).
3. In the threads pane, select an unread message and open the preview pane (by F8) if closed.
4. Wait until the message is marked as read in the threads pane.

Actual results: the number of unreads from step 2 has not changed

Expected results: it should have been decreased by 1

Workaround: Go to a different newsgroup and come back.

Wayne: Does this happen also on Tb? If it does, it might mean either two frontend bugs (Sm and Tb) or one backend bug (in MailNews Core).
